channel.title: My Sister's Keeper connections
channel.description:
Basically I'm writting a personal response on "My sister's Keeper", I can't think of any connections related to it. Basic summary: My Sister's Keeper is about a younger girl created by scientists to serve a purpose as a near perfect match for her sickly older sister. Every time her older sister get's diagnosed with something she has to donate something. Now she has to donate a kidney to save her sister's life, but the younger sister doesn't want to because she if fed up of being treated like a pawn. Basically I need 2 media connections for this story, All I can think of is Harry Potter 5's where
the prophecy tells them that neither can live while the other survives.
Aside from that I'm stumped. Anyone got any other connections? Keep in mind she was forced to donate blood, bone marrows, etc. Which is also forcing her to do things she doesn't want to do.

item.title: My Sister's Keeper connections

item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

reyx7:

Does your school purchase those literary criticism things like gale net? If so, use them. It’s just a bunch of college professors who do nothing but write essays analyzing this type of stuff.

yea but I’ve got the response down pat, I just need to find another connection and It’ll be done, anyways thanks for the help.

item.title: My Sister's Keeper connections
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

Basically I’m writting a personal response on “My sister’s Keeper”, I can’t think of any connections related to it.

Basic summary:

My Sister’s Keeper is about a younger girl created by scientists to serve a purpose as a near perfect match for her sickly older sister. Every time her older sister get’s diagnosed with something she has to donate something. Now she has to donate a kidney to save her sister’s life, but the younger sister doesn’t want to because she if fed up of being treated like a pawn.

Basically I need 2 media connections for this story, All I can think of is Harry Potter 5’s where

the prophecy tells them that neither can live while the other survives.

Aside from that I’m stumped.

Anyone got any other connections?

Keep in mind she was forced to donate blood, bone marrows, etc. Which is also forcing her to do things she doesn’t want to do.
